00020 PreferenceDialog::PreferenceDialog(QWidget* parent) 
00021     : QDialog(parent)
00022 {
00023     setupUi(this);
00024 
00025     unsigned short int nbFormat = 0;
00026     unsigned short int nbCrypto = 0;
00027 
00028     if(ModuleManager::count()>0)
00029     {
00030         moduleListWidget->clear();
00031 
00032         QList<ModuleInterface*> moduleList = ModuleManager::getList();
00033         for(int i=0; i<moduleList.size(); i++)
00034         {
00035             ModuleInterface* module = moduleList.at(i);
00036 
00037             QListWidgetItem* item = new QListWidgetItem(module->name()+" ("+module->version()+")", moduleListWidget);
00038 
00039             ModuleManager::Category cat = ModuleManager::getCategory(module);
00040             if(cat == ModuleManager::IMAGEFORMAT)
00041             {
00042                 item->setIcon(QPixmap(":/icons/img/imageformat.png"));
00043                 imageFormatComboBox->addItem(module->typeSupported());
00044                 m_imageFormatMap[module->typeSupported()] = nbFormat++;
00045             }else if(cat == ModuleManager::CRYPTO){
00046                 item->setIcon(QPixmap(":/icons/img/crypto.png"));
00047                 cryptoComboBox->addItem(module->typeSupported());
00048                 m_cryptoMap[module->typeSupported()] = nbCrypto++;
00049             }
00050         }
00051     }
00052 
00053     this->setConfig();
00054 
00055     connect(this, SIGNAL(accepted()), this, SLOT(accepted()));
00056     connect(this, SIGNAL(rejected()), this, SLOT(rejected()));
00057     connect(outputToolButton, SIGNAL(pressed()), this, SLOT(selectFile()));
00058 }
00059 
00060 void PreferenceDialog::setConfig()
00061 {
00062     outputLineEdit->setText(Controller::config.get("output"));
00063 
00064     if(m_imageFormatMap.contains(Controller::config.get("imageformat")))
00065     {
00066         imageFormatComboBox->setCurrentIndex(
00067                 m_imageFormatMap[Controller::config.get("imageformat")]
00068                 );
00069     }
00070     else
00071         imageFormatComboBox->setCurrentIndex(0);
00072 
00073     if(m_cryptoMap.contains(Controller::config.get("encryption")))
00074     {
00075         cryptoComboBox->setCurrentIndex(
00076                 m_cryptoMap[Controller::config.get("encryption")]
00077                 );
00078     }
00079     else
00080         cryptoComboBox->setCurrentIndex(0);
00081 
00082     if(Controller::config.get("charset")=="Latin1")
00083         charsetComboBox->setCurrentIndex(1);
00084     else if(Controller::config.get("charset")=="ASCII")
00085         charsetComboBox->setCurrentIndex(2);
00086     else
00087         charsetComboBox->setCurrentIndex(0);
00088 }
00089 
00090 void PreferenceDialog::accepted()
00091 {
00092     Controller::config.set("output", outputLineEdit->text());
00093     Controller::config.set("imageformat", imageFormatComboBox->currentText());
00094     Controller::config.set("charset", charsetComboBox->currentText());
00095     Controller::config.set("encryption", cryptoComboBox->currentText());
00096     Controller::config.save();
00097 }
00098 
00099 void PreferenceDialog::rejected()
00100 {
00101     setConfig();
00102 }
00103 
00104 void PreferenceDialog::selectFile()
00105 {
00106     setCursor(Qt::WaitCursor);
00107     QFileDialog dialog(this, tr("Select default output dir"));
00108     dialog.setViewMode(QFileDialog::List);
00109     dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::DirectoryOnly);
00110     dialog.setDirectory(QDir::homePath());
00111     if(dialog.exec())
00112     {
00113         QStringList fileNames = dialog.selectedFiles();
00114         if(fileNames.size()>0)
00115         {
00116             if(QFile::exists(fileNames.at(0)))
00117                 outputLineEdit->setText(fileNames.at(0));
00118             else
00119                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"),
00120                                      fileNames.at(0)+"\n"+
00121                                      "The folder selected doesn't exists.\n"+
00122                                      "Please select an other destination !");
00123         }
00124     }
00125     setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
00126 }
